meanings.definition: The act of blasting or exploding.
meanings.sent1: The blastulations of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The blastulations of the dynamite echoed through the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The blastulations from the construction site startled the birds nearby.
meanings.sent4: The blastulations of the volcano shook the entire island.
meanings.sent5: The blastulations of the cannon fire could be heard for miles.

meanings.definition: A loud, sudden sound or noise.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected blastulations of thunder made everyone jump.
meanings.sent2: The blastulations of the car crash could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent3: The blastulations of the balloon popping made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The blastulations of the fire alarm sent everyone into a panic.
meanings.sent5: The blastulations of the fireworks filled the night with color and sound.

meanings.definition: An expression of excitement or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: Blastulations! I can't believe we won the game!
meanings.sent2: Oh blastulations! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent3: Blastulations! The surprise party was a success.
meanings.sent4: Blastulations! The news of the promotion spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: Blastulations! The crowd cheered as the band took the stage.
